title: Blue Moon
summaries: The Blue Moon is a pre-Hardmode flail that, when used, will emit light around it. The Blue Moon is stronger than the Ball O' Hurt or The Meatball but is weaker than the Sunfury. The Blue Moon has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from the Locked Gold Chests found in the Dungeon, as well as a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being obtained from Golden Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
